attributes.action: immediately extend the same level of tax free allowances available to members of parliament to every single person in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To be an MP is to be an employee.  There are thousands of people in this country who work in a different place to where they live (most of them further away than the 9 miles which qualifies McNulty for his SHA) who have absolutely no help with the costs of their employment.  why is this?  MPs have no right to special treatment so if the facility is not to be removed it must, to maintain probity, be extended to everybody!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
